Posts.Content: Aug 11, 2009 07:05PM LoriRR wrote: Hi Cathey, I just finished #16 on the shortened plan! Now I have 3 boosts and I am done! It went so quickly and almost without much of a reaction. Just today I developed itchy skin high on my breast-the part that shows when you wear a v neck. Dr. gave me some cream and suggested cold cloths. Works great. I hope all goes as well for you. I also started Arimidex last May-before my surgery and I am experiencing a few side effects but they are mild. I hope your days pass quickly! LoriÂ
